transcript: I can't, I have to go back to work. I don't have time to go back to my house and get all of that stuff and then get back in line and wait for another 45 minutes.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I can't go--I have to go back to work.  I don't have time to go back to my house and get all of that stuff and then get back in line and wait for another forty five minutes.
